text:
Located in the heart of Lausanne, the Powerhouse Romandie aims to be an inspiring place for IT passionates where meetups, conferences, hackathons, trainings, and coworking will take place. Come and have a coffee with us or book your work place [here](https://tiny.cc/powerhouse-reservation). 

**Place de la Gare 10, Lausanne**
title: Powerhouse Romandie
